TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 提供可以在屬性方格中選取屬性影像的使用者介面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for selecting an image for a property in a property grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是提供讓使用者選取屬性的映像之使用者介面。An is a that provides a user interface for the user to select an image for a property. 當使用者啟動編輯器時，它會顯示**開啟檔案**對話方塊可讓使用者瀏覽至目錄，並選取檔案。When the user starts the editor, it displays an **Open File** dialog box that enables the user to navigate to a directory and select a file. 編輯器的預設檔案名稱副檔名一開始篩選檔案清單。The file list is initially filtered by the default file name extensions for the editor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用關聯與屬性。The following code example uses an to associate the with a property. [!code-cpp[EditorAttributesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CPP/class1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[EditorAttributesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CS/class1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[EditorAttributesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/VB/class1.vb#3)]

permission.span: 用於存取 unmanaged 程式碼。

span.span: for access to unmanaged code.

summary.span: 使用指定的副檔名陣列和指定的分隔符號來建立副檔名的字串。

span.span: Creates a string of file name extensions using the specified array of file extensions and the specified separator.

returns.span: 字串，含有指定的副檔名，每個副檔名以指定的分隔符號區隔。

span.span: A string containing the specified file name extensions, each separated by the specified separator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的擴充程式表示開啟檔案對話方塊中的檔案類型來篩選檔案清單中的預設。The specified extensions indicate the file types for the open file dialog box to filter the file list for by default.
